scripts.prestart:docker: mkdir -p axe-results && sudo chmod 777 axe-results && docker build -t axe .
scripts.start:docker: docker run --rm --network host -v ${PWD}/axe-results:/app/axe-results -e COMMIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse HEAD) axe
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:cleanup && test:e2e:startserver && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest tests/e2e.test.js; npm run test:e2e:stop
scripts.test:e2e:docker: docker build -f Dockerfile.tests -t axe-e2e && docker run -rm --network host axe e2e
